1.content: First off, who are you?
1.title: One shall stand......one shall fall.

choices: go to visit your uncle in his new house
attend a unique and advanced "space camp"
travel to Tibet to further your martial arts training
143.content:
(Set just prior to the events depicted in the movie Transformers: Dark of the Moon)

You're not sure what to make of your "uncle," former Seven Sector Agent Seymour Simmons. But he had definitely made your childhood interesting.

The only daughter of your single parent mother, Prisha Laghari (a second generation Indian-Canadian), nobody ever explained to you why you were christened with the name Bethany Anne Simmons. It definitely sounds something you name a blonde hair blue eyed girl. Not someone with your brown eyes, black hair and olive complexion,

At age four, you were introduced to your "Uncle" Seymour, who ensured that over the next fourteen years,you had an extensive, if eclectic, education.

Your visitations with your uncle Seymour were sporadic, and each time he suggested a different familial relationship with you. This includes you being his half-sister or his illegitimate daughter. You were never sure what to believe, but whatever your real relationship was with Seymour Simmons, you definitely benefited from it.

Your mother was totally disinterested in you, allowing a long line of tutors, instructors and private teachers to raise you. This suited you just fine.

Your mother was more interested in her seemingly unending string of boyfriends. None of these boyfriends ever gave you any trouble, though. They actually seemed to be afraid of you. It appeared that even when he wasn't there, your "uncle" was never far away.

Then, at age eighteen, with the publication of his book Code-Name Hero: How Seymour Simmons & the Aliens Saved the World, you learned a lot more about your uncle than you ever knew. You still didn't know the exact nature of your relationship with him, but at least some of your questions had been answered.

Your adventure begins a couple of days after your eighteenth birthday, when you
143.title: Bethany Simmons

info.brief_description: The Transformers have come to Earth.  What happens?
info.description:
The Autobots and Decepticons have brought there thousand year war to Earth. And your caught in the middle of it. What will happen?

Here are the rules to this interactive
This story is based off of the live-action film series
I'll allow some adult content, but don't go overboard
Use the movie characters or create your own
The main character (you) should stay human
Keep the narrative in first person
Use as much detail as possible
Try to use proper grammar
Thats it, Enjoy.
